item.description:
***** You may call the Liberty Hotel at (617) 224-4000 to confirm if this cancelled
 *****

On Tuesdays, the Liberty Hotel shows the work of local artists with a complimentary wine tasting from 6:00 PM until 8:30 PM. So, before you go to or come from home, the gym, work, dinner, or wherever, meet up with a few drinking buddies for a minute or two or three or four or more...however long you're able.

Mariah Daly's work will be on display. The information I found about her mentions watercolor and pottery as her medium.

Gallery Night Flyer

Check out Liberty Bar Menu if you plan to eat and Liberty Bar Cocktail Menu if you prefer mixed drinks

Check out MBTA or  Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Charles/MGH (red line) is the closest subway station and steps away. Government (green & blue lines) subway station is less than a ten (10) minute walk.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

 

You'll find me wearing a white shirt with  a purple sparkly peace sticker
item.how_to_find_us: You'll find me at the high tables near the Clink Restaurant entrance playing the card game solitaire and wearing a purple sparkly peace sign sticker on a white shirt.
item.name: An Evening of Art and Wine at the Liberty Hotel - Tuesday August 23rd
